skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: product management dictionary
Developer Terms of Use (German, DE)
des:
Tim Herbig is an experienced Product Guy who likes to spread the knowledge about the craft of product management as well as during his day job and with side projects like this. 

After holding product roles at smaller startup and in the publishing industry, he was most recently the Product Manager for the Premium membership at XING and is now Head of Product at ORBIT - Digital Masterminds.

You can ask, "Alexa, ask product management dictionary what is the definition of Product Discovery?" or "Alexa, ask product management dictionary the definition of MVP."
priv:
